original_title: Sanford Meisner: The American Theatre's Best Kept Secret
overview: A leading acting teacher who trained some of the most famous performers of the stage and screen, Sanford Meisner was a founding member of the Group Theatre. The Group Theatre, a cooperative theater ensemble, became a leading force in the theater world of the 30s. Meisner performed in many of the groupâ€™s most memorable productions.
title: Sanford Meisner: The American Theatre's Best Kept Secret
